00043 
00044     // Get the number of columns in the observation matrix Typically
00045     // use multiple columns to provide a different observation to each
00046     // agent, so the number of columns is the same as getAgents()
00047     virtual int getObsCols();
00048 
00049     // Get the total number of agents. Usually 1.
00050     virtual int getAgents();
00051

00053     // necessarily, the same as the number of agents.
00054     virtual int getActionDim();
00055 
00056

00058     // Global reward.
